words.source: H935 (בּוֹא, 'to go/come'), Qal imperative masculine singular; KJV 'Go in', ESV 'Go in', NASB 'Go'
H1696 (דָּבַר, 'to speak'), Piel imperative masculine singular; KJV 'speak', ESV 'tell', NASB 'speak'
H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
H4428 (מֶלֶךְ, 'king'), noun common masculine singular construct; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'king of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
H7971 (שָׁלַח, 'to send'), conjunction + Piel imperfect 3ms; KJV 'that he let … go', ESV 'to let … go', NASB 'that he let … go'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל, 'Israel'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Israel'
H776 (אֶרֶץ, 'land/earth'), preposition-min + noun common feminine singular construct + 3ms suffix; KJV 'out of his land', ESV 'out of his land', NASB 'from his land'
